mapper.insert: insert into wangyin_sign_details(customerId, starter_credit_code, starter_company_name, starter_company_address, starter_type, starter_phone, receiver_type, receiver_company_name, receiver_company_credit_code, receiver_company_address, account_number, account_name, account_node, payment, confirmation, contract_id, sign_state, agreement) values (#{customerId}, #{starterCreditCode}, #{starterCompanyName}, #{starterCompanyAddress}, #{starterType}, #{starterPhone}, #{receiverType}, #{receiverCompanyName}, #{receiverCompanyCreditCode}, #{receiverCompanyAddress}, #{accountNumber}, #{accountName}, #{accountNode}, #{payment}, #{confirmation}, #{contractId}, #{signState}, #{agreement})
